mapper.insert: insert into annex (file_name, file_time, file_down, file_type) values (#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileDown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update annex set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_time = #{fileTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_down = #{fileDown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_del_state = #{fileDelState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, file_name, file_time, file_down, file_type, file_del_state from annex
